page.title: 08Playground Games
page.content: At our school, the girls play different games to suit the weather, but the boys' all year round favourite game is football. Boys occasionally play shinty and sometimes join the girls for British Bulldogs or Hide and Seek. Girls enjoy hockey and made up games based on T.V. programmes like Grange Hill. Handstands are popular or just chatting. Skipping games are played to rhymes partly made up by the girls. When snow comes, everybody can have snowball fights on the pitch or use plastic sacks to slide down the slope at the back of the school. When the weather is cold and wet we stay in the corridors where the boys practise breakdancing. In the girls' cloakrooms, they sometimes play Bom Bom Be A.
